Articles.Content:
The Kerbal space program have been given finances by the Kerbal government and also budget cut, so to finance with their space program they are looking at contracts from 3rd party companies.

Join me and my kerbals struggling with with financial difficulties of running a space program, as we take our first steps into space.

Well any space program never goes as planned, this time though its our colleague Newmal Kerman rocket has blown up leaving him floating in orbit around Kerbin. First though we have to fulfill some contracts before we loose the space program so testing parts it is then go save Newmal. Meanwhile we find the KKK (Keep Kerbals on Kerbin society) had caused the explosion on Newmals rocket (we have a security breach) security has been increased by erecting a black monolith near the KSC stating Squad, that should scare them off.

Edited November 26, 2014 by Orb8Ter

Ok so we havent had any more interferiance from the KKK (Keep Kerbals on Kerbin society) so now we can concentrate on the important things, yep snacks and also going to the Mun. Newmal Kerman is going to the Mun to look for landing and picnic spots, he may even get some science done well find out in the video below:D

Edited November 26, 2014 by Orb8Ter

Episode 4 of Kerbalinian odyssey

Landing on the Mun with a cold. This time around we set up some communication satellites and preform our Mun landing not a good idea when you have a cold but we must Kerbal on.

Please hit the like button as it helps cure colds I've heard.

Or a comment, I'll give that a try,

Or Subscribe, LOL.

On no Jebediah is stranded and what's worse is new management are more concerned with their strategies.

So we take things into our own hands, well we have been running the space program by ourselves anyway.

But before we go rescue Jeb we need to get moore science, complete some contracts and discover a secret project.

I have made this with post commentary so let me know if you enjoy or how I can improve, cheers.Ã¯Â»Â¿

- - - Updated - - -

KSP Kerbalinian Odyssey - 06 - Rescue? Demise? of Jebediah

Quick we have to go to the Mun to rescue Jebediah Kerman, lets help Ribnie Kerman go and save Jeb but will we be in time?

Well we continue our Kerbalinian Odyssey and while we g

The signal detected is at the North pole, we must send Newmal on a secret mission and learn what is going on up there.

Episode 7 of Kerbalinian Odyssey and we have found something interesting that has captivated the administrator of the KSP, but its not out there in space on its here on Kerbin at the north pole to be precise.

Join Newmal and Co to find out what is at the north pole while we still have to continue on with our space program.

[h=1]

[/h]After loosing contact with Newmal he wakes up on top on the Dome that he had found, so we send a Tactical Science Team to investigate the north dome. Also we mess up our Minmus encounter DOH!

This is a short episode as life gets in the way but enjoy, have any ideas for the series then let me know either in the comments or by message.

The Dome has been entered and an investigation is underway by Bill, Doomon and Ludwell. While they find something strange we continue to gather science launching to Minmus TWICE as we lost power on the last probe, we eventually get there with the probe'Miss Minmus' as well as finally start our transfer to Moho with our 'Moore science Moho probe', and why is this called Ludwell's Ice cream well find out at the end of the episode.

Kerbals and their snacks.

We at last send a Kerbal to Minmus and set up our first space station, oh and Ludwel uncovers a secret from the mysterious device in the dome,

shows him images of Duna so we make our plans, well what do you think we need a space station for.

Ok so we are planning to go to Duna but first we need to do some testing build our space station and get Bob back from Minmus first, also I want to start using using KSP 0.90 Beta than ever my current save doesn't allow me to upgrade buildings so will have to think of some way of using the new version perhaps a clever story.
